meaningMnemonic: With lots of <kanji>grief</kanji> and <kanji>gloom</kanji> in your life you'll probably end up in a spiral of <vocabulary>depression</vocabulary>. Don't worry, you'll be okay. Things get better with time so don't give into the <vocabulary>gloom</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
